pr_title: Lays the groundwork for permitting other Netty transports while retaining Netty as an implementation-only concern.

timeline.bodyText: Why does the method return an optional, if you call .get on it? If this is mandatory, it should not return optional. If it is optional, you should check for the existence of value and throw a meaningful exception
timeline.author: tomas-langer
